mapper.select: SELECT u.iuser,u.iauth, a.auth, u.upw, u.uid, firebase_token AS firebaseToken FROM user u JOIN auth a ON a.iauth = u.iauth WHERE u.uid = #{uid}
mapper.update: update user set firebase_token = #{firebaseToken} where iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(pai.ipayment) + COUNT(pr.iproduct) from payment pa JOIN product pr on pa.iproduct = pr.iproduct AND pr.`status` = 'ACTIVATED' JOIN payment_info pai ON pai.ipayment = pa.ipayment AND pai.`status` = 'ACTIVATED' WHERE pa.iusers = #{iuser} OR pr.iusers = {iuser}
select count(ichat) from chat_user where iusers = #{iuser}

SELECT u.y, u.x, u.nick, u.stored_pic as storedPic, us.phone, us.email, u.rating, u.addr, u.rest_addr as restAddr, us.auth, u.`status` FROM users us Left JOIN user u ON us.iuser = u.iuser WHERE us.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT u.`status` FROM users us LEFT JOIN `user` u ON us.iuser = u.iuser WHERE us.uid = #{uid}

SELECT COUNT(pai.ipayment) + COUNT(pr.iproduct) from payment pa JOIN product pr on pa.iproduct = pr.iproduct AND pr.`status` NOT IN ('COMPLETED') JOIN payment_info pai ON pai.ipayment = pa.ipayment AND pai.`status` NOT IN ('COMPLETED') WHERE pa.iusers = #{iuser} OR pr.iusers = #{iuser}

SELECT distinct pr.iproduct, pa.ipayment, pa.iuser, pai.`status` FROM `user` u left JOIN product pr ON pr.iuser = u.iuser left JOIN payment pa ON pa.iproduct = pr.iproduct left JOIN payment_info pai ON pai.ipayment = pa.ipayment WHERE u.iuser = #{iuser}
SELECT distinct pa.ipayment, pai.`status` from payment pa JOIN payment_info pai ON pa.iuser = pai.iuser WHERE pa.iuser = #{iuser}
